item.title: Video Editing for our FuturePlanet - Upwork
item.description:
FuturePlanet is a community of action. Our aim is to inspire people to make the world a better place.

We are looking for someone who can support our creative team to get our video content into the world.

We have an videographer and we have a podcast producer and have lots of content being produced. This often gets blocked when it comes to the final elements production.

We would love to receive some support on this.

There are three types of content we are creating

- Founder led content, videos we shoot at home or on location
- Content we shoot with partners on location
- Podcast content

Depending on the video we need to receive ongoing support to

Finalise raw footage with subtitles,  endframes, music and colour grading
Find (or Film) and incorporate on brand Broll and video content
Uploading content to relevant platforms (hubspot, sprout video, youtube, tiktok)

Thank you ❤️



Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 04:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Color Grading, Video Intro & Outro, Concept Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Subtitles
Skills: Music Video, Color Grading, Video Intro & Outro, Concept Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Subtitles
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor For Top 10/Scientific Discoveries YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Rate: $80 per video

We are looking for someone who can edit Top 10 videos for our YouTube channel based on random facts and scientific discoveries

Looking for someone who can deliver multiple videos a week

You will be responsible for editing YouTube videos similar to these

https://youtu.be/vqy9s-_kpHA?si=FPZvEICD6qR-e2KQ
https://youtu.be/P5ZXk_7oJKQ?si=1KW2KRYVxhgbBHeM

Videos will be anywhere from 20 to 30 minutes long

You will be fully provided with a voiceover and a script for each video

Responsibilities:

- Edit video footage to create engaging, fast paced, high-quality content

- Proficiency in selecting and synchronizing the most fitting footage (extremely important)

- Able to utilize the lower third and background graphics given to them to give the channel a more branded look

- Meet deadlines of completing 2 videos a week - all content is delivered on time and to the highest standard

Requirements:

- Ability to work quickly and efficiently under tight deadlines

- Willing to accept constructive feedback and open to making revisions as needed

- Strong attention to detail


Budget: $80
Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube (Sport/Football/Soccer niche) - Copyright Expert - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Video Editor that is an Expert in Copyright clean content.

We require experience in the YouTube Football/Soccer niche.

Please DO NOT apply if you don't have experience editing videos for YouTube channels.


We’ll create mini documentary videos similar to:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6dkNR9oR1DI&t=5s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8b5O33KWUEE&t=118s
https://www.youtube.com/@KickKorner/videos


- Mostly videos around 12-15 minutes long, and some longer format 22-25+
- Producing 2-3 per week on time
- We provide Script and Voice Over
- The Editor gathers all material, footage, images etc.
- We require 2 deliverables: the Video edited and the Soundstrip with music and effects without the narration.
- We require an NDA to be signed

Skill Requirements:
- Experienced Copyright Expert
- The best communication skills
- Fast response & turnaround time
- Being able to find source material & references
- Be passionate about Football/Soccer

Please answer the questionnaire accurately and in detail for efficient communication

Looking forward to working with you!

Andrés



Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography, Content Writing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography, Content Writing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: We are looking for a 2D Animation Stick Figure Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Finance History/Facts
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-72 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Finance  niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Finance History Stories/Facts

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/kW6uIYcbniA?si=Kcku1YsjDBY20_3G

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- 2D art and animation experience
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “greencandle”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, 2D Animation, 2D Art, Animation, 2D Design & Drawings
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, 2D Animation, 2D Art, Animation, 2D Design & Drawings
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creator for How-To Tutorial videos (long-term, good French required!) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

Looking for a video creator who can make engaging how-to/tutorial videos for our established YouTube channel. Join our team and showcase your skills in explaining software, apps, and e-mail marketing tools through step-by-step tutorials. Disclaimer: these are NO animation explainer videos, but screen recordings.

Requirements:
● Fluent French speaker (Should have a good level in French)
● Willingness to record phone/computer screens, voice (and possibly face)
● Ability to explain concepts clearly and concisely
● Good quality microphone

What's in it for you:
● Payment per video, paid biweekly. Earn more with more videos.
● Flexible work hours, record at your convenience.
● Collaborate with a motivated team to create valuable videos.
● Long-term position for stable income and flexible hours. If this sounds
appealing, we'd love to hear from you!
Please include a voice sample with your message. Feel free to ask questions.
Looking forward to connecting!
Best regards,
Marc.

Please mention your favorite animal in the first sentence of your application message For me to know you've read this description till the end.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:47 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Parisian French Accent, Voice Acting, French, Voice Talent, Voice-Over, Tutorial
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Parisian French Accent, Voice Acting, French, Voice Talent, Voice-Over, Tutorial
Country: Cameroon
click to apply

item.title: Business Intro Video - Upwork
item.description:
I run a Marketing Agency that offers Graphic Design, Web Design and Printing services.
I would like to make a video that explains my services in an interactive manner and show some of my work.

www.brandmeup.com.au is my website, Ideally I would like to add the video on my web homepage and also use this to advertise on social media.
I can provide logo in vector format and my previous works to be displayed.
Please note:- I will provide some of my works in Adobe Illustrator files, you should be able to extract works from them and export in required formats.

Below are 2 examples of what I am trying to achieve, I would like to have something similar to this
https://www.facebook.com/share/v/sYD1aZsGeEs81cde/?mibextid=oFDknk
Visit this link, on the homepage you will see a video link saying play showreel
https://madeagency.com.au/


Budget: $150
Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:23 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Commercial, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Animate, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Intro & Outro, Explainer Video, Graphic Design, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects

item.title: YouTube Video Editor for Physiotherapy Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an expert video editor that can put together explainer videos for our Physiotherapy YouTube Channel.

We will provide the script and voiceover. The videos will be around 5 minutes each on average. We are looking to start with 1 video per week and in the future grow from there.

The footage will either be explainer / animated content highlighting the area of the body that the script is talking about.

If this is not possible we will need you to source stock videos / images or videos / images of elite athletes of what is being talked about and zoom in or highlight the body part.

Eg. A Hamstring Injury

You could find a video of Usain Bolt doing a hamstring injury to start the video, then have a still image that highlights the area and demonstrates what is being explained in the script.

Please start your application with the number 7.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: Australia
click to apply
